product_name: Bladerunner Ice Dazzle Ice Skates - Girls' - Special Buy
long_description: Give your budding figure skater an edge in the girls' Dazzle Ice Skates from Bladerunner Ice. Their adjustable system expands 4 full sizes for growing feet, so you avoid buying new skates every year. Low center of gravity provides good balance and control. Locking buckle, laces and power strap create a secure fit. Hinged, molded cuff offers lateral support and forward flex. Padded velvet liner adds comfort and warmth and eliminates the need to "break in" skates. Carbon steel blades on the Bladerunner Ice Dazzle Ice Skates have toe picks for easier stopping. Special Buy.
short_description: Give your budding figure skater an edge in the girls' Dazzle Ice Skates from Bladerunner Ice. Their adjustable system expands 4 full sizes for growing feet, so you avoid buying new skates every year.
